title: Expense Explorer
description: A clean and simple Flutter app to track weekly expenses with charts, date picker, and a scrollable list of transactions.

title: Job Application Portal
description: A Spring Boot + JSP based job application system supporting job listings, applications, and data handling.

title: Netflix GPT
description: A Netflix-style movie browsing app with GPT-powered movie suggestions, user authentication, and dynamic movie data.

title: Moody (Mood Tracker App)
description: A mood-tracking web app to log daily emotions with notes, filters, and CRUD features. Built with Firebase for real-time data storage and authentication.

title: Employee Directory (CRUD + CI/CD)
description: A Spring Boot CRUD application with MySQL persistence, H2 in-memory tests, and full CI/CD pipeline setup.
